algebraic_word_problem: A train is 400 meters long. It crosses a bridge in 40 seconds at a speed of 30 meters per second. What is the length of the bridge?
step_by_step_solution:
Total distance = Train length + Bridge length
Total distance = Speed * Time = 30 * 40 = 1200 meters
Bridge length = 1200 - 400 = 800 meters
